MS MCQs

    Display relationships in Xamarin.Forms with master-detail navigation - Switch between pages in a drawer menu

    »

    1. When you’re displaying the master page by using Popover behavior, what must be done to the master page after a selected detail page appears?

      The master page must be hidden again, by using the IsPresented property.

      The master page must be properly disposed of via the Dispose method.

      The master page can remain displayed during Popover presentation.


    2. When the user selects an item in the master page, what must the developer do to present the appropriate page?

      The appropriate page will be displayed automatically.

      Write code to load the appropriate page.

      Handle the MasterDetailPage.PageSelected event and load the appropriate page.
